ygData.subject: Re: Sapphires?
ygData.msgSnippet: Where can you get sapphires is my question?  Money isn t an issue, but i can t find the gems. Eldon
ygData.messageBody:
Where can you get sapphires is my question? Money isn't an issue, but i
can't find the gems.

Eldon

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Thomas Adelsberger [mailto:ta@...]
> Sent: Thursday, June 17, 1999 6:09 AM
> To: _EQ_Magic@onelist.com
> Subject: Re: [_EQ_Magic] Best wizard equipment ! ! SPOILER
>
>
> From: Thomas Adelsberger <ta@...>
>
> Hail !
>
> Vincent Archer wrote:
>
> > A sapphire platinum necklace requires a platinum bar (~100pp)
> and sapphire (also
> > ~100pp), so the base cost, materials only is 200pp! Don't
> expect a jeweler to
> > make one for you without asking for at least 500pp.
>
> Ouch hehe well this is much ! ;)
>
> > progress. Now, if tailors could make special leather armors...
> or tinkers good items.
>
> But they can make some nice studded and reinforced armor.
> I just hope this trade is worth the time, because currently im
> trying to make some studded.
> But it looks like its hard to raise.
> I tried to make gorget, but i allways failed. (3 times)
> For more i dont have money ;)
> And i hate blacksmithing !
> 23 plat for about 6 studs hehe and blacksmithing still at 23 haha
>
> bye
> Hurok
>
